name: ~ D R E A M ~ E M U L A T O R ~
name_original: ~ D R E A M ~ E M U L A T O R ~
description:
WASD to Move
ESC to Exit

Sound currenty missing

Done as part of the LSD Game Jam 2020. Unfortunately I didn't have nearly the time for this that I though I had. It's been a strange year and this project effectively became a little area for me to try some new things. I hope to keep adding to it in future to bring out it's full planned weirdness.
